thread.title: Snapdeal Preview Monday Sale: 5 great deals from Apple iPhone 6 to LG Nexus 5
thread.title_full: Snapdeal Preview Monday Sale: 5 great deals from Apple iPhone 6 to LG Nexus 5 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Snapdeal Preview Monday Sale: 5 great deals from Apple iPhone 6 to LG Nexus 5
text: Snapdeal has kicked off Diwali celebrations early with a sale, aptly called ‘Preview Monday Sale’. The sale is only valid for the day, and promises offers across various categories including electronics, clothing, footwear and home appliances to name a few. Following are some of the best deals on the e-commerce site today that you shouldn’t miss out on. Apple iPhone 6 16GB: The iPhone 6 16GB gold variant, which usually costs around Rs 40,000 is available for Rs 38,999 on Snapdeal. The Space Grey variant too is available at this low price, but the silver variant is listed at Rs 43,500. You can get a further 10 percent discount on your purchase if you use a SBI debit or credit »
